h1.title: Convert JPG to TIFF Online

converter.title: JPG to TIFF Converter
converter.description: Convert JPG images to TIFF with LZW/ZIP lossless compression and accurate colors.

h2.title: Why Convert JPG to TIFF?
h2.description:
TIFF is a professional, archival-grade format used in imaging and print:

  • Lossless options: Save a clean master without new JPEG artifacts.
  • Print-ready: Preserves detail for high-resolution output.
  • Flexible: Supports alpha channel and multiple color spaces (reader-dependent).
  • Workflow friendly: Stable for repeated edits and hand-offs.

Note: Converting from JPG (lossy) will not magically restore lost detail — nhưng giúp tránh suy giảm thêm ở các lần lưu sau.

h2.title: How to Convert JPG to TIFF Online
h2.description:
1. Click Upload JPG and choose your photo.
  2. Wait for processing.
  3. Click Download TIFF to save the file.

Default: 24-bit RGB, LZW lossless, 300 DPI.

h2.title: TIFF vs JPG: Key Differences
h2.description:
FeatureJPGTIFF
CompressionLossy (JPEG)Lossless (LZW/ZIP) or JPEG/none
File sizeSmallLarger (depends on compression)
TransparencyNoOptional alpha (reader-dependent)
Best forWeb/photos sharingEditing, print, archiving

h2.title: Supported Limits & Formats
h2.description:
• Accepted input: JPG/JPEG (image/jpeg)
  • Maximum file size: up to 16 MB per file
  • Output: TIFF (.tiff, MIME image/tiff)
  • Defaults: 24-bit RGB, LZW compression, 300 DPI

h2.title: Troubleshooting
h2.description:
• File too large: TIFF is heavier by design. For smaller lossless, try JPG to PNG.
  • Need transparency: Source JPG lacks alpha; convert and edit alpha in an editor, or start from PNG.
  • Color shift: Convert to sRGB before upload for web consistency.
  • Upload fails: Ensure JPG/JPEG ≤ 16 MB.

faq.question: Is this JPG to TIFF converter free?
faq.answer: Yes, the converter is completely free with no hidden charges or subscriptions.

faq.question: Will TIFF work on all applications?
faq.answer: TIFF is widely supported in professional apps (Photoshop, Affinity, many RIP/print tools). Some simple viewers may not support all compression options.

faq.question: How much larger are TIFF files compared to JPG?
faq.answer: Typically 3–10× larger than JPG of the same dimensions (varies by content and compression).

faq.question: What file sizes are supported?
faq.answer: You can upload images up to 16 MB per file.

faq.question: Are my files safe?
faq.answer: Files are processed automatically and not retained longer than necessary for conversion.

faq.question: Can I convert multiple JPGs at once?
faq.answer: This page converts one file at a time. For bulk needs, repeat the process or use a batch tool.

faq.question: Does TIFF support layers?
faq.answer: Standard TIFF is a flat image; một số ứng dụng ghi 'layered TIFF' theo cách riêng. Công cụ này xuất TIFF phẳng (flat).

note: TIFF phù hợp lưu trữ/ấn loát nhưng dung lượng lớn. Cho web, cân nhắc PNG/WebP/AVIF.
